about_the_game:
Life's good for Daigo Manabe. Work is going well, he's got some boys to kick it with on the weekends, the only thing he's missing is a girlfriend... It's not like he doesn't try to get out there, but there's one lady he can't get out of his head… His BOSS!? Who can blame him?

Arisa Shinoda is a 100% certified MILF (and a great manager to boot)! She's a single mother who roared back to the professional scene after she left her ex-husband in the dirt. Arisa is a professional woman who pushes people to do their best but keeps everyone in the office happy. She'll even pour everyone drinks at company parties! You could search Japan three times over and never find someone better than her, according to Daigo at least.

Our tale of lust lewd behaviour starts at an office party. Everyone is drinking and having a good time, when Arisa pulls our man Daigo aside to let him know something came up and she has to leave early to return to the office, and tasks him with maintaining the party vibe.

After everyone finishes their drinks and snacks, Daigo makes a quick trip back to the office to check if Arisa might need a hand. Instead of helping the boss burn the midnight oil filing a last minute TPS report, he finds her knuckles deep in an unexpected deed… She's masturbating?!

The sight before him is so glorious, his body is acting on instinct. Before he knows it, Daigo's pants are off and he has joined Arisa in this late-night masturbation session. As they both reach their respective climaxes, all the emotions he has swirling around inside overflow and he stands up from his vantage point. In their afterglows, they share a silent moment staring at each other in disbelief...

Seeing Daigo standing before her, rock-hard like the stud he is, Arisa goes all in on a gamble to relieve her frustrations. Frustrations that were caused by her sister-in-arms, Shiori, fucking Arisa's own son!? Hearing what those two get up to every night has left our MILF manager feeling pretty (sexually) frustrated.

Making this the perfect opportunity to take her favorite employee for a test ride, giving him a unique opportunity to prove himself capable of handling the most pressing tasks a busty boss can assign to the intrepid Daigo! Will this budding office romance end as a one-night fling? A depraved friend with benefits situationship? Or, can love bloom, even in an office space?

FEATURES

  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel

  • Arisa is fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue

  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants

  • Hours of story content

  • Audio, including music and special effects

  • Enhanced with animated character sprites

  • Gallery and Scene selections

  • Over 20 H-Scenes that need to be reviewed and jerked off to before the shareholder's meeting!

I Wanna Fuck My Busty Boss is the English localization of a Visual Novel created by legendary Japanese developer Orcsoft. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**

All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: My Boss and I: Past and Present

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains strong language, general mature content, scenes depicting explicit sexual content, consumption of alcohol where characters are under the influence of alcohol in sexual scenarios.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Cheers! To the best boss in the biz! Everyday is great if your boss is Arisa Shinoda. She's successful, she's humble, she's got a rockin' bod, AND you know she's a freak in bed after you catch her masturbating in the office after hours!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
